name: CyberSlav
description:
Russia, 2096.

Everyone thought that technological progress would bring comfort and improvement for all of humanity ... but they were wrong.

The technological evolution has turned into a virus and has triggered a process of mental degradation that is expanding very quickly on a global level.

The security measures and the quarantine procedures were not enough to stop the phenomenon that is now spreading and turning all people into disadvantaged cyberpunks and infecting humanity.

Boris is trying to escape from all this madness..
---------------------------------------------------------------

CyberSlav is meant for shooter lovers, especially those with a survival component and where the challenge aesthetic is very strong.

DEVELOPED BY:

  • Michelangelo Borsarelli
  • Patrick Coviello

  • Alessandro Mottola
